overview:
Diverse and experienced emotional idea and campaign creator with 10 years entrepreneurial experience and 6 years new media marketing and campaign experience. Timâ€™s time has been invested with fortune 500 brands, non-profits and local companies in focus of creating a branding and marketing plan that created results.

Being a big picture thinker, the team plays a huge part in the execution of the plan. Tim has been a part of leading, supporting and training teams to create publications, campaigns and new media initiatives. The right people being in place makes all the difference.

Tim will look at the main purpose of the communication that is needed and devise a plan of action through people that delivers the desired result in a qualifiable and quantifiable way. Therefore, always building and creating a better mousetrap until lightning is captured in the bottle.
